name: Imabikisou: Kaimeihen
overview: Imabikisō Kaimei Hen (literally translated as 'Imabikisō: Elucidation Chapter') is a visual novel in Japanese. Compared to the PlayStation 3 version Imabikisō, it contains several new stories. The game also supports 5.1 surround sound through Dolby Pro Logic II, which allows players to listen to sound from behind and immerse themselves in the game's atmosphere.
